page.title: 10FARMING.
page.content: In the area there are eight farms, mainly arable but some with stock. {Lodge Farm}is tenanted by Mr.Mackley who keeps over forty head of Friesian cows for milking. { Langar Grange}is also arable but with sheep.{Willow farm}is owned by Mr.Nicholls but he went to Tasmania and Mr.Robert Nunn now looks after the farm.It is a poultry farm with about seventy thousand chickens. { Lodge Farm}is now up for sale.The National Coal Board purchased the farm when they had plans for siting a pit head in the Vale of Belvoir. Mr.J Stanley farms the fields around {Stathern Lodge. White House Farm}is owned by Mr.Clamp. The main crops grown in the area are Winter barley,wheat,oil_seed rape. Grass is grazed,silaged and grown for hay.
